entry.title: $2342 // The Best Luxury 1BR in Fantastic Area, Close to Transit + Much More
entry.content:
414 Hicks St

The building at 414 Hicks Street, in Cobble Hill Brooklyn has no fee studio, one and two bedroom apartments. The apartments feature new bamboo floors, modern kitchens with new stainless steel appliances, spacious bedrooms with great closet space. Building amenities include a large courtyard for tenants to enjoy, fitness center, onsite parking, virtual doorman, live in super, and on-site laundry facility. 414 Hicks is conveniently located to transportation. The immediate area in the Columbus Street Waterfront District in Cobble Hill is a great neighborhood near the waterfront, parks and conveniently located.

entry.title: $2695 // True 1 Bedroom in Full Service Building with Doorman
entry.content:
Large and bright 1 bedroom features.

* Gas, Heat and Water included in rent
* Verizon FIOS and Time Warner Cable available
* Easy online maintenance requests/package notifications with BuildingLink
* Stainless Steel Appliances including Dishwasher & Microwave
* In Wall Speakers with IPOD Docks
* In Unit Washer/Dryer

Building Features:
* 24 Hour Doorman
* Package room including cold storage (for Fresh Direct or Grocery deliveries)
* Fitness Center with free weights and latest machines
* 50-foot long indoor swimming pool, open year-round
* Wi-Fi enabled lounge with entertainment center
* 20,000 square foot rooftop with gorgeous 360 Degree views & the Manhattan skyline
* Complimentary bike storage
* Up to 2 Pets Allowed, 50lbs combined weight (no additional pet fees)

I specialize in No Fee luxury buildings. End your search by contacting me and allowing me to show you the best available apartments for your personal criteria. All at no cost to you.

entry.title: $1825 // 1 Bedroom apartment for rent by owner - $1825/month
entry.content:
Up for rent is a 1 Bedroom 1 bath apartment in a 6th floor walk up.
Water and heat is covered, tenant is responsible for electricity and gas.
Laundry is in the basement of the building.
No Pets.
Cross streets are Hicks and Baltic.Close to the Bergen street train station on the F/G line. Near many restaurants, cafes, bars. Trader Joes nearby as well as a NYSC.

When responding to this ad, please provide FULL name, phone number and email.


Income requirement: 44x of the monthly rent (annual pretax salary)
Also subject to credit check as well, which the applicant will be billed for.
Deposit = 1x rent
